attributes.action: force travel companys to stop increasing holiday prices during school holidays
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: More and more parents are taking their children out of school during term time to enjoy a family holiday.  Recently I check prices for a centre parcs holiday and the price went up by £600 during half term - scandalous.  The government should force holiday operators to stop increasing prices this will encourage families to keep their children in school during term time

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
